properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:38PM CST until February 13 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Accumulating snow Expected Late Wednesday into Thursday...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 9 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Wednesday afternoon and Thursday
morning commutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. The latest road
conditions for Indiana are available by calling 18002617623.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY
